pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 远古
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 用于浪费电的显卡
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 近现代
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 不需要
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
